fields.name: base
fields.description: Base template for emails.

fields.name: organisations/staff_member/invite
fields.description: The email that is sent to partner staff member when he have been registered in the system.
fields.subject: eTools {% if environment %}{{ environment }} {% endif %}- Invitation
fields.content:
Dear Colleague,

You have been invited to the eTools. To get access to our system follow link.

{{ login_link }}

eTools Team

fields.name: audit/engagement/submit_to_auditor
fields.description: Email that send to auditor when engagement have been created.
fields.subject: [Auditor Portal] ACCESS GRANTED for {{ engagement.get_engagement_type_display }}, {{ engagement.unique_id }}

fields.name: audit/engagement/reported_by_auditor
fields.description: Email that send when auditor fill engagement's report.
fields.subject: {{ engagement.agreement.auditor_firm }} has completed the final report for {{ engagement.get_engagement_type_display }}, {{ engagement.unique_id }}

fields.name: audit/engagement/action_point_assigned
fields.subject: [eTools] ACTION POINT ASSIGNED to {{ action_point.person_responsible }}

fields.name: email_auth/token/login
fields.description: The email that is sent to user to login without password.
fields.subject: eTools Access Token
fields.content:
Dear {{ recipient.get_full_name }},

Please click on this link to sign in to eTools portal: 

{{ login_link }}

Thank you.

fields.name: tpm/visit/assign
fields.description: Visit assigned. TPM should be notified.
fields.subject: {{ visit.reference_number }} visit was assigned.

fields.name: tpm/visit/reject
fields.description: TPM rejected visit. Notify focal points & PME.
fields.subject: {{ visit.reference_number }} visit was rejected by tpm.

fields.name: tpm/visit/accept
fields.description: TPM accepted visit. Notify focal points & PME.
fields.subject: {{ visit.reference_number }} visit was accepted by {{ visit.tpm_partner.name }}.

fields.name: tpm/visit/report
fields.description: TPM finished with visit report.  Notify PME & focal points.
fields.subject: TPM submitted report for {{ visit.reference_number }} visit.

fields.name: tpm/visit/report_rejected
fields.description: Report was rejected. Notify TPM.
fields.subject: Report was rejected for {{ visit.reference_number }} visit.

fields.name: tpm/visit/approve_report
fields.description: Report was approved. Notify UNICEF focal points.
fields.subject: Report for {{ visit.reference_number }} visit was approved.

fields.name: tpm/visit/approve_report_tpm
fields.description: Report was approved. Notify TPM.
fields.subject: Report for {{ visit.reference_number }} visit was approved.

fields.name: tpm/visit/assign
fields.description: Visit assigned. TPM should be notified.
fields.subject: [TPM Portal] TPM Visit Request for {{ implementing_partners|join:', ' }}; {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ visit.tpm_partner.name }},

UNICEF is requesting a Monitoring/Verification Visit for {{ implementing_partners|join:', ' }}.

Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities.all %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.partnership.title }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations.all|join:', ' }}
Section: {{ activity.section.name }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link for additional information and documents relatied to the visit: {{ visit.get_object_url }}

Thank you. {% endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/reject
fields.description: TPM rejected visit. Notify focal points.
fields.subject: {{ visit.tpm_partner.name }} has rejected the Monitoring/Verification Visit Request {{ visit.reference_number }}

fields.name: tpm/visit/accept
fields.description: TPM accepted visit. Notify focal points & PME.
fields.subject: {{ visit.tpm_partner.name }} has accepted the Monitoring/Verification Visit Request {{ visit.reference_number }}

fields.name: tpm/visit/report
fields.description: TPM finished with visit report.  Notify PME & focal points.
fields.subject: {{ visit.tpm_partner.name }} has submited the final report for {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient.first_name }},

{{ visit.tpm_partner.name }} has submited the final report for the Monitoring/Verification visit{% if partnerships %} requested for {{ partnerships|join:', ' }}{% endif %}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities.all %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.partnership.title }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations.all|join:', ' }}
Section: {{ activity.section.name }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link to view the final report: {{ visit.get_object_url }} and take the appropriate action {Accept/Request for more information}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/report_rejected
fields.description: Report was rejected. Notify TPM.
fields.subject: Request for more information on the Final report for the Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient.first_name }},

UNICEF has requested additional information on the final report submited for the Monitoring/Verification visit to Implementing Partner{% if visit.tpm_activities.count > 1 %}s{% endif %} {{ implementing_partners|join:', ' }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities.all %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.partnership.title }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations.all|join:', ' }}
Section: {{ activity.section.name }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link to view the additional information/clarifications requested: {{ visit.get_object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/approve_report_tpm
fields.description: Report was approved. Notify TPM.
fields.subject: UNICEF approved Final report for the Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient.first_name }},

UNICEF approved final report submited for the Monitoring/Verification visit to Implementing Partner{% if visit.tpm_activities.count > 1 %}s{% endif %} {{ implementing_partners|join:', ' }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities.all %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.partnership.title }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations.all|join:', ' }}
Section: {{ activity.section.name }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link for additional information: {{ visit.get_object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/approve_report
fields.description: Report was approved. Notify UNICEF focal points.
fields.subject: UNICEF approved Final report for the Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient.first_name }},

UNICEF approved final report submited for the Monitoring/Verification visit to Implementing Partner{% if visit.tpm_activities.count > 1 %}s{% endif %} {{ implementing_partners|join:', ' }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities.all %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.partnership.title }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations.all|join:', ' }}
Section: {{ activity.section.name }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link for additional information: {{ visit.get_object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/action_point_assigned
fields.description: Action point assigned to visit. Person responsible should be notified.
fields.subject: [eTools] ACTION POINT ASSIGNED to {{ action_point.person_responsible.email }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ action_point.person_responsible.first_name }},

{{ action_point.author.get_full_name }} has assigned you an action point related to Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}.
Implementing Partner{% if visit.tpm_activities.count > 1 %}s{% endif %} {{ implementing_partners|join:', ' }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities.all %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.partnership.title }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations.all|join:', ' }}
Section: {{ activity.section.name }}

{% endfor %} Please click this link for additional information: {{ visit.get_object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}
